332602.「彼らは この地に住まう精霊たちじゃ。\n わし以外の生きた者を見るのは 久しぶ:
They are the spirits that inhabit this land. It's been a long time since I've seen anyone alive other than myself. Please don't be
offended.

332603.「そこにあるのが わしの家じゃ。\n 遠慮せず 入るがよいぞ。: That is my home. Feel free to come in.

332604.「では 試練の内容を伝えるぞ。\n わしが 精霊に頼んで 呼びよせた\n 精霊獣:
I will now tell you the details of the trial.
I'm going to fight the spirit beast that I
asked the spirits to summon and win.

332605.「じゃが ただ殴りあって 倒せれば合格では\n 試練として 芸がなかろう？\n:
But if we just beat each other up and beat
each other down, that's not good enough for a
trial, is it? So, let me try a twist.

332606.「この戦いには ひとりで 挑め。\n そして この精霊たちを 仲間とし\n 協力:
You will fight this battle alone. And with
these spirits as your companions, you will
fight together.

332607.「本来 精霊に 個体を示す名はないんじゃが\n こやつらには特別に わしが 名を:
Originally, spirits did not have individual
names, but I have given them each a special
name: Aruppa, Iruppi, and Uruppu.

332608.「初めまして <pc>様。\n 私は アルッパと申す しがない精霊。\n 以後:
Nice to meet you <pc>. I am Aruppa,
a humble spirit. Please take care of me from
now on.

332609.「あたしは イルッピよ。\n 戦いは苦手だから 参加しないけど\n パンメッポ様:
I'm Iruppi. I'm not good at fighting, so I
won't participate, but I'll follow you as a
liaison with Mr. Pammeppo!

332610.「オイラは ウルップってんだ。\n <pc>のために 戦ってやるよ。\n オイラ:
I'm Uruppu. I'll fight for <pc>.
You're going to have to be patient!

332611.「精霊獣に対して おぬしの攻撃は\n 効果が低く 倒すには 苦労するはずじゃが\:
Your attacks are not effective against spirit beasts, and you will have a hard time defeating them, but that is not the case if
the attack comes from a spirit.

332612.「つまり おぬしは みずから 戦うよりも\n この精霊たちを守り 活かす戦いを\:
In other words, you must think of battles that
will protect and revitalize these spirits
rather than fight your own battles.

332613.「１体でも 仲間の精霊が倒されたら\n そこで 試練は失敗とする。心するがよい。:
If even one companion spirit is killed, the
trial will fail. Be careful.

332614.「精霊たちは 今回の試練と 無関係の戦いには\n 手を貸さぬから そのつもりでな:
The spirits will not help in any battles
unrelated to this trial, so please be aware of
that.

332615.「わしは イルッピを通して おぬしを見られるし\n 離れていても 声を届かせるこ:
I can see you through Iruppi, and I can reach
you from afar. Be good friends with them all.

332616.<pc>は 隠者パンメッポから\nおとも精霊（だいじなもの）を 受け取った。<m:
<pc> received a Spirit Companion (Key
Item) from Panmeppo.<me 60>

332617.「おお いかん。大事なことを忘れておった。\n 戦いの際は 回復がおこなえる職で:
Oh, no. I forgot something important. When you
fight, you must have a job that allows
recovery. We must protect the spirits.

332618.「では 精霊獣と 戦ってくるのじゃ。\n 真なるロヴォス高地 ゼドラ洞の奥にある:
Then go and fight the spirit beasts. Head for
the Dragon Nest, deep within the true Rovos
Highlands Zedra Cave.
